aka: Our Lady of the Chinese Shop

cast.name: 大卫·卡拉科尔 David Caracol

awards:
第75届洛迦诺国际电影节(2022)
　　当代电影人单元金豹奖(提名) 埃里·克拉弗
this_title: Nossa Senhora da Loja do Chinês
trans_title: Our Lady of the Chinese Shop
introduction: When a chinese merchant brings a peculiar plastic holy figure of Our Lady to a neighborhood of Luanda, a mourning mother will seek peace, a committed barber starts a new cult and a stray kid will look for revenge for his lost friend. This bizarre urban tale will reveal a family and city facade full of resentment, greed and torment.
foreign_title: Nossa Senhora da Loja do Chinês
